text.div:
Tumor Stage

Codes to represent the stage of a tumor.

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include codes from http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/ncit.owl where concept descends from NCIT:C48232

name: TumorStage
title: Tumor Stage
publisher: Global Alliance for Genomics and Health
description: Codes to represent the stage of a tumor.
